p: To assess immune response, CD4 + T cell count was measured by a flow cytometer BD FACSCount™ System (Becton Dickinson, Franklin Lakes, N.J., USA). HIV-1 RNA viral load (VL) was quantified with an Abbott RealTime HIV-1 Amplification Reagent Kit (Abbott Molecular, Chicago, USA) and NUCLISENS EASYQ HIV-1 2.0 (BioMérieux, France) according to the manufacturer's instructions. Virologic failure was defined as measurement of VL above 1000 HIV RNA copies/ml, and then, HIV-1 pol gene was analyzed.
